about_the_game:
Rivals Duel is a single action game. You will be able to control your character and maneuver him quickly.

*third person game
*Controlse weapons, swords and bows
*Use your move to dodge enemy attacks
*You will have the enemy chasing you
*You can select the weapon class

In the demo: You can play on the vegetation map for duels or dungeons
